title: Magical Land of Ladakh
description: Heaven is supposed to be that ethereal place which has the best and unreal landscapes, kind and amazing people, great food and lots of peace. That is exactly what Ladakh is!!! Where else would you find snow covered mountains co existing with sand dunes, hot springs at one end and a cold blue lake at another? Journey to Ladakh is always Special one. We missed it last time due to Covid but not this time. Don't worry, we are back once again with the Experience for Life

inclusions.title: Transportation
description: Pickup from Srinagar Hotel & Drop to Delhi bus stand.
Entire Road trip by comfortable Tempo Traveller.
All sightseeing as per Itinerary.
Overnight Bus journey from Manali to Delhi by semi sleeper Volvo AC bus.

inclusions.title: Meal Plans
description: Total 27 Meals :
10 Breakfasts
6 Lunches
10 Dinners

inclusions.title: Stay Experience
description: Accommodation for 10 Nights :
3 nights in Deluxe Hotel
2 nights in Deluxe Camp
5 nights in Beautiful Homestay on Triple/Quad sharing basis.

inclusions.title: Others
description: Water bottles.
Tour Captain throughout the trip.
Guide & Expertise charges.
Inner Line Permit charges.
Oxygen cylinder charges.
First aid and basic medication charges.

exclusions: Any personal expenses like: Tips, Insurance, Laundry, Phone calls.
Any other food & beverage charges that is not included in inclusions.
Anything that is not mentioned under Inclusions.
note: All prices are subject to change without prior notice due to fuel prices and/or unforeseen economic circumstances.

itenary.title: Day 1
itenary.heading: Flight to Srinagar
description: Airport Arrival, transfer to hotel.
Hotel check in and rest.
Post lunch free to stroll around Dal Lake & have soothing Shikara ride.
Night at hotel in Srinagar.

itenary.title: Day 2
itenary.heading: Srinagar to Kargil
description: Post breakfast start journey to Kargil.
Covering Sonmarg, Zoji La Pass & Drass Memorial enroute.
Night at resort in Kargil.

itenary.title: Day 3
itenary.heading: Kargil to Leh
description: Post journey start journey towards Leh.
Covering Lamayuru, Lunar landscapes, Sangam, Magnetic hill & Gurudwara Patthar Sahib enroute.
Night at homestay in Leh.

itenary.title: Day 4
itenary.heading: Leh local sighseeing
description: Post breakfast go for local sightseeing.
Full day sightseeing includes Shey, Thiksey Monastery, Shanti Stupa, Hall of Fame - Military museum, Leh Palace etc.
Night at homestay in Leh.

itenary.title: Day 5
itenary.heading: Leh to Nubra valley
description: Post breakfast journey to Nubra valley.
Driving through highest motorable pass Khardung-La, Hunder sand dunes, world famous double hump camel safari at sand dunes.
Night at Homestay in Hunder.

itenary.title: Day 6
itenary.heading: Nubra to Turtuk to Nubra
description: Today we will start early in the morning, towards India's last inhabited accessible village & one of the most beautiful village!
Till 1974 Turtuk was under Pakistan's control & only after 2010 it is accessible for Indian tourist to visit there.
Will return to Nubra by evening & night there.

itenary.title: Day 7
itenary.heading: Hunder to Pangong Lake
description: Post breakfast, we are going for dreamy lake of Pangong.
Beautiful landscapes, Mesmerizing Lake & Enjoy stay near lake.
Night at Camps in Pangong.

itenary.title: Day 8
itenary.heading: Pangong to Leh
description: Go for Sunrise. Later have a scrumptious breakfast.
Spend good time near lake.
Post Lunch we will proceed towards Leh.
Easy day, evening free for shopping and relax.
Night at Homestay in Leh.

itenary.title: Day 9
itenary.heading: Leh to Jispa
description: Post early breakfast, we will move towards Jispa.
Today we will be covering beautiful landscapes like  Debring, Moore plains, Baralacha la before finally arriving at jispa.
Overnight at Camps in Jispa.

itenary.title: Day 10
itenary.heading: Jispa to Manali
description: After arrival, have a breakfast & hotel check in.
Day free to explore local sightseeing & shopping on your own.
Night at Hotel in Manali.

itenary.title: Day 11 - 12
itenary.heading: Manali to Delhi
description: Post breakfast we will check out and move towards Bus stand.
Via overnight Volvo Bus to Delhi and from there will be taking flight to Home!!

Where else would you find snow covered mountains co existing with sand dunes, hot springs at one end and a cold blue lake at another? Journey to Ladakh is always Special one. itenary.heading: Nubra to Turtuk to Nubra
description: Today we will start early in the morning, towards India's last inhabited accessible village & one of the most beautiful village!
Till 1974 Turtuk was under Pakistan's control & only after 2010 it is accessible for Indian tourist to visit there.
Will return to Nubra by evening & night there.

itenary.title: Day 7
itenary.heading: Hunder to Pangong Lake
description: Post breakfast, we are going for dreamy lake of Pangong.
Beautiful landscapes, Mesmerizing Lake & Enjoy stay near lake.
Night at Camps in Pangong.

itenary.title: Day 8
itenary.heading: Pangong to Leh
description: Go for Sunrise. Later have a scrumptious breakfast.
Spend good time near lake.
Post Lunch we will proceed towards Leh.
Easy day, evening free for shopping and relax.
Night at Homestay in Leh.

itenary.title: Day 9
itenary.heading: Leh to Jispa
description: Post early breakfast, we will move towards Jispa.
Today we will be covering beautiful landscapes like  Debring, Moore plains, Baralacha la before finally arriving at jispa.
Overnight at Camps in Jispa.

itenary.title: Day 10
itenary.heading: Jispa to Manali
description: After arrival, have a breakfast & hotel check in.
Day free to explore local sightseeing & shopping on your own.
Night at Hotel in Manali.

itenary.title: Day 11 - 12
itenary.heading: Manali to Delhi
description: Post breakfast we will check out and move towards Bus stand.
Via overnight Volvo Bus to Delhi and from there will be taking flight to Home!!

title: Coorg-Ooty
description: Heaven is supposed to be that ethereal place which has the best and unreal landscapes, kind and amazing people, great food and lots of peace. That is exactly what Ladakh is!!! Where else would you find snow covered mountains co existing with sand dunes, hot springs at one end and a cold blue lake at another? Journey to Ladakh is always Special one. We missed it last time due to Covid but not this time. Don't worry, we are back once again with the Experience for Life

inclusions.title: Transportation
description: Pickup from Srinagar Hotel & Drop to Delhi bus stand.
Entire Road trip by comfortable Tempo Traveller.
All sightseeing as per Itinerary.
Overnight Bus journey from Manali to Delhi by semi sleeper Volvo AC bus.

inclusions.title: Meal Plans
description: Total 27 Meals :
10 Breakfasts
6 Lunches
10 Dinners

inclusions.title: Stay Experience
description: Accommodation for 10 Nights :
3 nights in Deluxe Hotel
2 nights in Deluxe Camp
5 nights in Beautiful Homestay on Triple/Quad sharing basis.

inclusions.title: Others
description: Water bottles.
Tour Captain throughout the trip.
Guide & Expertise charges.
Inner Line Permit charges.
Oxygen cylinder charges.
First aid and basic medication charges.

exclusions: Any personal expenses like: Tips, Insurance, Laundry, Phone calls.
Any other food & beverage charges that is not included in inclusions.
Anything that is not mentioned under Inclusions.
note: All prices are subject to change without prior notice due to fuel prices and/or unforeseen economic circumstances.

itenary.title: Day 1
itenary.heading: Flight to Srinagar
description: Airport Arrival, transfer to hotel.
Hotel check in and rest.
Post lunch free to stroll around Dal Lake & have soothing Shikara ride.
Night at hotel in Srinagar.

itenary.title: Day 2
itenary.heading: Srinagar to Kargil
description: Post breakfast start journey to Kargil.
Covering Sonmarg, Zoji La Pass & Drass Memorial enroute.
Night at resort in Kargil.

itenary.title: Day 3
itenary.heading: Kargil to Leh
description: Post journey start journey towards Leh.
Covering Lamayuru, Lunar landscapes, Sangam, Magnetic hill & Gurudwara Patthar Sahib enroute.
Night at homestay in Leh.

itenary.title: Day 4
itenary.heading: Leh local sighseeing
description: Post breakfast go for local sightseeing.
Full day sightseeing includes Shey, Thiksey Monastery, Shanti Stupa, Hall of Fame - Military museum, Leh Palace etc.
Night at homestay in Leh.

itenary.title: Day 5
itenary.heading: Leh to Nubra valley
description: Post breakfast journey to Nubra valley.
Driving through highest motorable pass Khardung-La, Hunder sand dunes, world famous double hump camel safari at sand dunes.
Night at Homestay in Hunder.

itenary.title: Day 6
itenary.heading: Nubra to Turtuk to Nubra
description: Today we will start early in the morning, towards India's last inhabited accessible village & one of the most beautiful village!
Till 1974 Turtuk was under Pakistan's control & only after 2010 it is accessible for Indian tourist to visit there.
Will return to Nubra by evening & night there.

itenary.title: Day 7
itenary.heading: Hunder to Pangong Lake
description: Post breakfast, we are going for dreamy lake of Pangong.
Beautiful landscapes, Mesmerizing Lake & Enjoy stay near lake.
Night at Camps in Pangong.

itenary.title: Day 8
itenary.heading: Pangong to Leh
description: Go for Sunrise. Later have a scrumptious breakfast.
Spend good time near lake.
Post Lunch we will proceed towards Leh.
Easy day, evening free for shopping and relax.
Night at Homestay in Leh.

itenary.title: Day 9
itenary.heading: Leh to Jispa
description: Post early breakfast, we will move towards Jispa.
Today we will be covering beautiful landscapes like  Debring, Moore plains, Baralacha la before finally arriving at jispa.
Overnight at Camps in Jispa.

itenary.heading: Jispa to Manali
description: After arrival, have a breakfast & hotel check in.
Day free to explore local sightseeing & shopping on your own.
Night at Hotel in Manali.

itenary.heading: Manali to Delhi
description: Post breakfast we will check out and move towards Bus stand.
Via overnight Volvo Bus to Delhi and from there will be taking flight to Home!!
